=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Christmas Time in South Park Review Date: 2014/01/04 Store: Matt Stone (Director), Trey Parker (Director) Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Holidays & Seasonal, Christmas, Comedy Product Description: ['There\'s no better time of the year than Christmas, especially in South Park. So stop fighting with the family, gather \'round the fire and watch these classic South Park episodes. Join in as the citizens of South Park sing many of everyone\'s favorite holiday classics, like "Mr. Hankey the Christmas Poo" and "Christmas Time in Hell." See the boys bring Christmas to Iraq and learn how hard it is to be a Jew during this holiday season. Christmas is a time when we all can put aside out differences and agree on what the holidays are really about: presents! a Very Crappy Christmas, Mr. Hankey the Christmas Poo, Merry Christmas Charlie Manson!, Mr. Hankey\'s Christmas Classics, Red Sleigh Down, It\'s Christmas in Canada, Woodland Critter Christmas.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy/Television, Animation/Television', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Full Screen, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Color', 'Contributor': 'Trey Parker, Matt Stone', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 34 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2517', 'Director': 'Matt Stone, Trey Parker', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Full Screen, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Color', 'Run time': '2 hours and 34 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 13, 2007', 'Studio': 'Comedy Central', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: finally caved and bought it when netflix took it off of instant and the wait was just a mess this year.

Review Title: great pilot Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Snow Queen & Hogfather - Miniseries Double Feature Review Date: 2016/02/22 Store: Bridget Fonda (Actor), Sir David Jason (Actor), Various (Director) & 0 more Rated: G Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Welcome To The Whimsical World Of Fantasy Adventure!', 'Magical, colorful and terrifically twisting; these TV Miniseries keep in the tradition of', '10th Kingdom', 'and', 'Tin Man', '! Packed with mythical mystery and popular characters your family will be delightfully entertained with enchantment!', 'Snow Queen', '(2002) Color', 'Starring Bridget Fonda, Jeremy Guilbaut, Chelsea Hobbs', 'Once A Year She Rises. For One Season She Reigns.', "Since a bitter winter storm stole the life of Gerda's mother, she and her father have sadly continued to run the remote hotel they call home. Lonely and isolated, Gerda's only joy is Kai, the handsome bellboy. A mysterious guest with an icy stare arrives at the hotel one night, wrapped in fur and diamonds. By daybreak, the Snow Queen, has vanished with Kai! Gerda embarks on a journey of morphing seasons, fantastical creatures and long-frozen mysteries in a desperate quest to find her stolen love.", 'Hogfather', '(2006) Color', 'Starring David Jason, Marc Warren, Michelle Dockery', 'Expect The Unexpected', 'From the imagination of best-selling author Terry Pratchett comes', 'Hogfather', ", a magical and witty tale unlike anything you've seen before. It's the holiday of Hogswatch in the parallel universe of Discworld, the night when kids anticipate presents from the beloved Hogfather. But someone - or something - wants the Hogfather out of the way. Now it's up to the most unlikely of heroes to get the holiday back on track before humanity loses all hope.", 'Review', 'Wonderful Family Fun…In A Fabulous Fantasy Adventure --Hogfather - Daily Mirror'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Genre': "Children's", 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Bridget Fonda, Sir David Jason, Joss Ackland, Michelle Dockery, Various, Jeremy Guilbaut', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'MPAA rating': 'G (General Audience)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '6 hours and 9 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 15, 2013', 'Actors': 'Bridget Fonda, Sir David Jason, Jeremy Guilbaut, Michelle Dockery, Joss Ackland', 'Studio': 'Mill Creek Ent', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: have not watched snow queen - but hogfather is wonderful, and i'm so glad i own it now. still a bit confused as to why this set was cheaper than buying hogfather alone, but i'll take it. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Ninja Scroll [Blu-ray] Review Date: 2016/09/25 Store: Dean Elliot (Actor), Wendee Lee (Actor), Yoshiaki Kawajiri (Director) & 0 more Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Anime Product Description: ["Swords shatter, blood sprays and demons suck the life out of dying men as the wildest samurai adventure ever made is unleashed to tear your senses asunder! Jubei Kibagami has always been the master dealer of death, but in rescuing a ninja woman from a monster he sets loose a chain of events that puts death in his own veins and sends them on a nightmarish odyssey through a surreal and devil infested ancient Japan. How do demonic possessions, an annihilated village and a man Jubei thought safely buried in his past all connect? If Jubei can't piece the blood-soaked clues together, his only consolation will be that he won't live to regret it for very long! Prepare your mind and steel your gut for the insanely gore-packed orgy of violence that still stands alone and unchallenged as the ultimate anime action feature: the epic milestone in animation that is the legendary Ninja Scroll."] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Anime & Manga', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, Animated, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Yoshiaki Kawajiri, Emi Shinohara, Daisuke Gôri, Kôichi Yamadera, Dean Elliot, Richard Epcar, Wendee LeeYoshiaki Kawajiri, Emi Shinohara, Daisuke Gôri, Kôichi Yamadera, Dean Elliot, Richard Epcar, Wendee Lee See more', 'Language': 'English, Japanese', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 34 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '33339406', 'Director': 'Yoshiaki Kawajiri', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, Animated, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 34 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 19, 2015', 'Actors': 'Dean Elliot, Wendee Lee, Richard Epcar, Kôichi Yamadera, Emi Shinohara', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Section 23', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: it's hard to write a positive review for ninja scroll just because you finally got around to picking up a copy on blu-ray. but it's NINJA SCROLL. one of the best anime films ever made. and no matter how much i yell at it i can't get the blu-ray player to open up large enough to take all my awesome anime on VHS. Review Title: a classic. and awesome. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cowboy Bebop: The Complete Series - Amazon Exclusive Edition (Blu-ray/DVD Combo) Review Date: 2017/01/28 Store: YUTAKA MASEBA (Director) Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['Explore the far reaches of the galaxy in this undeniably hip series that inspired a generation – and redefined anime as an indisputable art form. The Bebop crew is just trying to make a buck. This motely lot of intergalactic loners teams up to track down fugitives and turn them in for cold hard cash. Spike is a hero whose cool façade hides a dark and deadly past. The pilot Jet is a bruiser of a brute who can’t wait to collect the next bounty. Faye Valentine is a femme fatale prone to breaking hearts and separating fools from their money. Along for the ride are the brilliant, but weird, hacker Ed and a super genius Welsh Corgi named Ein. On their own, any one of them is likely to get lost in the sprawl of space, but together, they’re they most entertaining gang of bounty hunters in the year 2071.'] Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Anime & Manga', 'Format': 'Blu-ray, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Henry Douglas Grey, Haruyo Kanesaku, Melissa Charles, David Lucas, John Billingslea, Wendee Lee, YUTAKA MASEBAHenry Douglas Grey, Haruyo Kanesaku, Melissa Charles, David Lucas, John Billingslea, Wendee Lee, YUTAKA MASEBA See more', 'Language': 'Japanese', 'Number Of Discs': '9', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.7 x 2.2 inches; 1.25 Pounds', 'Director': 'YUTAKA MASEBA', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray, NTSC', 'Run time': '10 hours and 50 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 16, 2014', 'Actors': 'David Lucas, John Billingslea, Wendee Lee, Melissa Charles, Henry Douglas Grey', 'Dubbed': 'English', 'Producers': 'Haruyo Kanesaku', 'Studio': 'Funimation', 'Number of discs': '9'} Review Text: loved it then, still love it now. who doesn't love cowboy bebop?! and for the price i paid it was a steal. the extras were kind of 'meh' but i was more about owning the series than anything else. Review Title: great boxed set for an amazing show Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Handmaiden Review Date: 2017/02/13 Store: Min-hee Kim (Actor), Jung-woo Ha (Actor), Chan-wook Park (Director, Producer) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles Product Description: ['From PARK Chan-wook, the celebrated director of OLDBOY, LADY VENGEANCE and STOKER, comes a ravishing new crime drama. Christmas Time in South Park Matt Stone (Director), Trey Parker (Director) Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Holidays & Seasonal, Christmas, Comedy ['There\'s no better time of the year than Christmas, especially in South Park. target_interaction.title: really enjoyed it
target_interaction.text: as far as reality tv in competition format is concerned this is nothing like the type of shows i typically groan at and avoid watching.  there was a huge stress on safety - especially for the dogs - and also about the bonds we have with our dogs, and the competitors' with their dogs, and how during their travels and learning new things in unfamiliar situations they were able to strengthen those bonds even further than they thought possible.  it wasn't nearly as much about winning as it was about the dogs, which was important.  and the charity aspect was very important to me (in fact i would have loved it if, for example, in costa rica they had a challenge working at the territorio de zaguates for an afternoon or something).  i did take off a star because it bugged me how apparently nobody could speak or pronounce any foreign languages except one contestant who spoke french.  unless that was intentional when choosing contestants it made me want to bash my head into a wall, with so many people hailing from areas in the USA with huge latinx populations who couldn't read, speak, or understand spanish.  but if you're going to be doing a show like this don't you think that would have been something you might have been studying for as well as prepping yourself - and your dog - for any other kinds of training?  watching americans run around expecting everyone else in the world to cater to them and speak english in their own countries just bugs me.
